parameters.html:
<style>
body {
  margin: 0;
  height: 100vh;
  overflow: hidden;
  background: #8c96ee; /* Set background color */
  will-change: background-position; /* Hint to optimize rendering */
  position: relative; /* Ensure pseudo-element is positioned correctly */
}

body::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    url('/images/background/furniture.png'),
    url('/images/background/furniture.png');
  background-size: 96px 96px; /* Size of the image */
  background-repeat: repeat; /* Repeat the image */
  background-position: 0 0, 96px 96px; /* Offset second layer by 50% */
  animation: move-images 30s linear infinite; /* Infinite animation */
  z-index: -1; /* Place behind other content */
}

@keyframes move-images {
  0% {
    background-position: 0 0, 96px 96px;
  }
  100% {
    background-position: 96px 96px, 288px 288px; /* Move background to create seamless loop */
  }
}
</style>

parameters.text: Items in this collection are all obtained by:
Enter Tom Nook's store on the last day of any month.  Bring any Raffle Tickets you've collected that month.
Wisp is the ghost that can be found after midnight between 12 AM and 4 AM.  Complete his task and he will give you an item or service.
A villager may post a Treasure Hunt on the bulletin board in a specific acre.
Talk to Katrina when she's in town.  If you have good luck, you may get one of these items.  If you do not talk to Katrina, your luck will always remain neutral.
